name: SmackDown Football 2d
description:
Smack Down Football 2d is an offline sport game where you can play against advance AI or with your friend. The game easy gameplay to measure your skills.
This football game has three level of difficulty each with different number of player and AI system.

Feature of the game.
1. The game has advance AI system to play against.
2. Offline multiplayer to enjoy with friends.
3. Easy gameplay.
